sentences.sContent: The government should do more to promote sustainable agriculture.
sentences.sCn: 政府应该做更多工作来推动可持续农业的发展。

sentences.sContent: the sustainable use of rainforest resources
sentences.sCn: 雨林资源的可持续利用

sentences.sContent: Cycling is a totally sustainable form of transport.
sentences.sCn: 骑自行车是一种绝对环保的交通方式。
生态环境的可持续发展

sentences.sContent: ...This obviously isn't sustainable in the long run...
...thus helping to expand the supply of a key sustainable material...
...says high-quality sustainable materials can still be tough to fine...
...Only in this way can free-admission to museums become a long-lasting phenomenon and have sustainable development...
...when asked if she owned any sustainable clothes...
...The most obvious problem is that it might give museums a very heavy economic burden which directly impedes the sustainable development of these organizations...
...the show inspired many top designers to work with sustainable fabrics for the first time...
...it is necessary to work out effective principles for the development of sustainable and recyclable campus...

words.tran: 持续的；持久的；持久不变的
持续性；永续性；能维持性
支持者，维持者；主发动机；支撑的人物
维持（sustain的过去式和过去分词）；承受
维持；支撑，承担；忍受；供养；证实

trans.tranOther: able to continue without causing damage to the environment
